THE 4STOP HISTORY

Business Milestone Focus:

2016 - FOUNDED

Technology acquired back from a Toronto Stock Exchange company and FourStop GmbH was founded.

2018 - ACQUISITIONS

Onboarded 50+ businesses world-wide (including Tier 1) providing KYC, compliance and anti-fraud.

2019 - INVESTMENT

In Q4 2018 revenues broke even. In Q1 2019 completed Series Round A investment based in Germany.

Product Milestone Focus:

2018 - LEADING TECH.

Implemented machine learning capabilities and further bolstering our data aggregation and data output functionality.

2018 - NEW UI/UX

Developed and implemented a new UI/UX to provide the best feature-rich user experience possible.

2018-19 - KYB SOLUTION

Designed, developed and implemented an enterprise-level global end-to-end multi-faceted KYB solution.

Addressable Markets

Providing one platform for businesses to effectively and efficiently manage their KYC, risk and compliance requirements, allowing them to expand globally with confidence - enriching our digital transactional ecosystem.

The 4Stop Solution.
Solving KYB, KYC, Compliance and
Anti-Fraud Industry Pain Points

4Stop aggregates trusted information, managed services, data, software and expertise to establish a next-generation all-in-one KYB, KYC, compliance and anti-fraud solution.

Through one API access a complete merchant KYB onboarding solution, thousands of global data points, hundreds of global KYC data sources, harmonised data science and 4Stop's proprietary anti-fraud and monitoring technology.

Quick & Efficient Merchant Onboarding. Complete End-To-End KYB Solution.

A recent report stated the average onboarding times to ensuring businesses and directors are properly verified for AML, compliance, and fraud prevention is 26 days and continuing to grow.

The 4Stop KYB solution dramatically reduces onboarding times, costs and manual reviews by providing all the tools required to onboard a merchant from a centralized platform.

One API Integration For Hundreds Of KYC With Automated Verifications.
Future-Proof Compliance & Anti-Fraud.

Solving KYC through multiple integrations increases costs and delay to market as it puts strain on IT Development resources, manual intervention and doesn't allow for fully automate KYC activation or harmonise data performance.

Through a single API integration instantly expand your KYC integrations and have access to hundreds of premium global KYC with real-time, on-demand activation. Paired with real-time verification processes, cascading logic and dynamic anti-fraud parameters to easily manage KYC for compliance and anti-fraud on a global scale.

Real-Time Intelligence.
With a Multi-Faceted Rules Engine and Dynamic Transactional Monitoring.

4Stopâ€™s proprietary real-time anti-fraud and monitoring technology allows you to monitor your traffic from a single-view-of-risk with quantifiable data and real-time intelligence. The rules engine is designed with robust feature-rich technology to allow dynamic checking and securing of customers and their transactions.

  • 800+ Pre-Determined Rule Parameters
  • Free-Form Rule Scripting
  • Cascading Rule Verification Technology

  • Automated Responses and System Actions
  • Time-Frame Intelligence
  • Association Logic

  • Fully Integrated Analytics
  • Real-Time Intelligence and Monitoring
  • Customised Exportable Data Reports

Premium Data Aggregation.
Thousands of Global Data Points.

Add our solution to your KYC integrations and maximising your global data points and data performance capabilities in a frictionless manner.

Through our data science establish full market profiles and risk rule simulations. With comprehensive data simulation reports you can make quantifiable decisions to confidently expand globally and / or optimize your current KYC data performance and fraud prevention.

A Proven Solution - Use Cases

Global With Confidence.
We currently support Tier 1 businesses KYB, KYC, compliance and anti-fraud across 6 continents.

GLOBAL KYB & KYC
Providing the largest selection of premium KYB and KYC global data sources from one API for premium data output results and experience.

MULTILINGUAL
Language is not a barrier with 4Stop. We provide multiple language support on data output to optimise data access and usability world-wide.

CUSTOMISED SET UP
From a white-labelled solution to cloud or on-premise set up, we ensure your 4Stop solution is configured to meet exactly your needs.

MANAGED SERVICES
From product and technical support, training, business intelligence to monitoring your overall risk services, our team is available 24/7 to help.

Future-Proof Your KYC

Activate in real-time any KYC data source required from just one API, eliminating the pressure on IT development resources and providing instant global KYC for compliance and anti-fraud coverage.
